short_description: This African country boasts miles of unspoiled coastline, vibrant coral reefs, and a rich cultural heritage. Visit the Bazaruto Archipelago for some of the best diving in the world, explore the historic town of llha de Mozambique, and sample some of the delicious seafood cuisine

weather.title: Mozambique has a tropical climate with high temperatures and humidity year-round. It experiences a wet season from November to April, with heavy rainfall and the possibility of cyclones, while the dry season from May to October offers drier conditions

when_to_visit.title: Dry season
when_to_visit.short_description: Comfortable temperatures, minimal rainfall, and optimal conditions for outdoor activities and beach relaxation

when_to_visit.title: Best for safari
when_to_visit.short_description: Coolest and driest period, making it a popular time for wildlife safaris and visiting the pristine beaches along the Mozambican coast. Note that mornings and evenings will still be chilly

when_to_visit.title: Wet season
when_to_visit.short_description: High temperatures, humidity, and occasional heavy rainfall. Some areas may become inaccessible during this time

weather.best_time: The best time to visit Mozambique depends on the region, but generally, the months of April to October offer pleasant temperatures, lower chances of rainfall, and ideal conditions for beach activities and wildlife viewing
